alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 12:39PM CDT until June 13 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... West central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1239 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blanchard, or 13 miles northwest of Shreveport, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Minden, Haughton, Greenwood, Blanchard, Benton, Sibley, Doyline, Dubberly, Dixie Inn, Belcher, Heflin, Eastwood, Fosters, Ferguson, Curtis, Fillmore, Cross Lake and Bodcau. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Red River; Webster
